content: I just announced a new integration between Dataverse and Open OnDemand, which is a web frontend to HPC resources: https://groups.google.com/g/dataverse-community/c/_vX899PJDY4/m/oj7wtIoOBgAJ
@Philip Durbin ðŸš€ I made it to the externaltool page!
I just created a PR to add it to the guides: https://github.com/IQSS/dataverse/pull/11769
As I announced on the Google Group, we just published a new video about the new integration between Dataverse and Open OnDemand. Enjoy! Lemme know if you have any questions! :smile:
